的使用

cn.seu.dkpure 使用的 cn.seu.dkpure 中的类
DigitalClock
          A custom clock widget
GearInfo
          A custom widget to show gear info
GearInfo.GAER_ENUMS

          A custom widget to show navigation message
RoadInfoBar.DISPLAY_MODE
           
WeatherView
          A custom widget to show weather information
WeatherView.WeatherInfoGetter
          An AsyncTask to retrieve weather information and parse it, then update the weather widget
